article.title: Lockheed Martin to Provide Additional Radar Systems
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corp., Liverpool, N.Y., was awarded a $145,921,161 modification (P00022) to contract W15P7T-12-C-C015 for an additional thirteen AN/TPQ-53 radar systems, along with 13 corresponding sets of on-board spares. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen, Md., is the contracting activity.
